import React,{Fragment} from 'react' import Moment from 'react-moment'; const EducationList = ({education}) => { const educationList=education.map(edu=>{ return( {}edu.school {edu.degree} {edu.from}-{edu.to===null ? ('NOW'):({edu.to})} ) }) return (

Education Credentials

{educationList}
School Degree Years
) } export default EducationList
